snippet: Producer prices rose 0.8 percent, but without food and energy the rise was only 0.2 percent. Economists dismissed a spike in gasoline prices as a statistical adjustment.
lead_paragraph: Producer prices rose 0.8 percent, but without food and energy the rise was only 0.2 percent. Economists dismissed a spike in gasoline prices as a statistical adjustment.

headline.main: Wholesale Prices Shot Up 0.8% in September, Fed by Gasoline
headline.print_headline: Wholesale Prices Shot Up 0.8% In September, Fed by Gasoline
